scenario_text.value: How’s this for you, eh?
Miu, are you okay?
Yeah, I think so. Thanks to Syakomon.
I’m glad. Now then...

If this goes on any further, you will lose.
Retreat while you still can!

There’s no way we’re dying! Why don’t we
look for a path where we can all survive?

If you stop now, we’ll spare your life.
You’re still gonna have to talk, though.
Hehehe... Pretty good for a bunch of children!

But how unfortunate for you.
You will regret underestimating us!
Oof?!
Uh...
Professor!
Miyuki!
Ahahaha! The maiden is mine!
Stop!

How naive you are! To think you might so
easily capture me!

She’ll get away with Miyuki by walking across
the ceiling!

So that’s how it appeared all of a sudden.
It was hiding above our heads the whole time?

Never mind that right now! It took Miyuki
away! What should we do?!
How did this happen...?

So our only choice is to completely destroy
Arukenimon! Right? But...
Stop hesitating! After it!
What?!

Hang on, Haru!
It’s too dangerous to go alone!
What? You think I’ll be safer with you?
Haru?
(How to approach Arukenimon...)
Let’s fight.
Ask for cooperation.
Find a way to escape.
Staying with all of you would be pointless.

Even if you won, it would mean nothing if we
lost Miyuki.

Takuma and the others gave their all.
Your anger is misplaced...

Like you would know!
You were useless just now!

It’s always the same with you! You can never
protect what’s really important!

I’m not like you! I’ve protected her all this
time! Now and forever, I will protect Miyuki!
I’m going after it. Don’t interfere!

You showed mercy on the enemy!
You let them take her!
Erm...

You have no way to control, defeat, or even
fight with Arukenimon!

It’s all your fault!
You put Miyuki in danger!

Hang on a second!
Think about what you’re saying!

I don’t care anymore. I can’t waste any more
time with any of you!
Haru, wait!
Shut up!

The enemy was right in front of you, and yet
you hesitated!

If you had just done your job, none of
this... Dammit!
Calm down, Haru. We’ll all go after her.

If we go now, we can make it.
No more arguing...

You’re right, but we won’t make it with these
slowpokes.
That’s harsh...
I’m saving Miyuki. I don’t need any of you!
What is wrong with him?

I get that Miyuki’s in danger, but he’s
just...unhinged.

For now, let’s follow them. We can’t let
Arukenimon get away.
You’re right.
(Please be okay, Miyuki...)
